body: Every so often, I log out of Avicus to go and do something, but I stay on the main menu of Minecraft. However, when I go back into multiplayer (practically seconds after leaving) it doesn't let me connect to Avicus - it simply says - "can't connect to server" or "connection timed out." Does anyone else experience this, and any reasons why it does? I'm just wondering about it because right at this moment, I cannot connect.
body_tagged: Every so often, I log out of Avicus to go and do something, but I stay on the main menu of Minecraft. title: Connection Problems

use the alternate ips, if you crash on one, use the other, and so on.
